p: Shahiduzzaman et al. (2015) provided a decomposition analysis for Australia’s total and per capita CO2 emissions for the period 1978–2010 by adopting the LMDI method. Their findings indicated that the energy efficiency and structural changes in the country’s economy lead to a modest decline in Australia’s total emissions. The authors also reported that Australia’s efforts to mitigate emissions should be remarkably higher in 2010–2020 period as compared to the 2005–2010 period.
